testcase.classname: To validate signin functionality in Target ecommerce Website
testcase.name: To validate signin functionality with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user should go to Target ecommerce homepage...........................passed When user should click signIn button and click on signIn link...............passed And user should enter invalid email and password...........................passed Then user should click signIn button and get error message..................passed

testcase.classname: To validate signin functionality in Target ecommerce Website
testcase.name: To validate signin functionality with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user should go to Target ecommerce homepage...........................passed When user should click signIn button and click on signIn link...............passed And user should enter valid email and password..............................passed Then user should click signIn button and login successful...................passed
